ModMetaData.name: [KK]Monitorian [WIP]
ModMetaData.author: KilianKilmister
ModMetaData.description:
This Mod adds a reptillioid race called Monitorian, Stronger and Faster than Humans, but bad in Ranged Combat and worse in crafting and researching
This mod is currently only the beginning of a complex reptillioid faction i want to create and i'm still learning allot about modding rimworld
